EmailTemplate.description: Temp Signs Email to customer with payment reminder before due date
EmailTemplate.name: Temp Signs Payment Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Friendly Reminder from SFMTA That You Have 2 Days Left To Pay For Signs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
This is a reminder that your request Case#{!Case.CaseNumber} was approved and you still have an outstanding balance of {!Case.Net_Due__c}. Please note that payment is due by {!Case.Payment_Due_Date__c} and we cannot accept payment after this date. Your request will be closed and you will have to submit a new one.
To make a payment online, please follow the link below and click the Visa button to enter your credit card information securely.
{!Case.Link}
Thank you, SFMTA
